issue.title: [CF 1346] is it posible to track engineering cds like nitro boosts from my belt ?
issue.body:
i tryed putting the spell id and puting the belt directly in tmw

 

any idea of what else i can do ?

 

thanks love the addon ;)


> Posted by CurseForge user Shinshan5674356 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1346 | Raw

comments.body:
This should work

 

^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SOnlyEquipped^B ^SType^Sicd ^SOnlyInBags^B ^SShowTimerText^B ^SEnabled^B ^SClockGCD^B ^SName^SNitro~`Boosts:~`120 ^SICDType^Sspellcast ^SConditions^T ^Sn^N1 ^t^SStates^T ^N1^T ^t^N2^T ^SAlpha^N0.5 ^t^N3^T ^t^N4^T ^t^t^t^N82302^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

Edited Nov 30, 2016

> Posted by CurseForge user mmz94

Where do i have to put that code ?

 

thanks for your answer ;)

Edited Nov 30, 2016

> Posted by CurseForge user Shinshan5674356

Import it in the addon

 

http://farbots.blogspot.com/2013/11/wow-tellmewhen-import-strings-overview.html

Edited Nov 30, 2016

> Posted by CurseForge user mmz94

The correct way to do this would be to use an Item Cooldown icon tracking your belt. If you want to always track your equipped belt, just enter "6" in the "What to track" field.

Edited Dec 10, 2016

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
